de.adorsys.datasafe.directory.impl.profile.keys

Class DocumentKeyStoreOperationsImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.adorsys.datasafe.directory.impl.profile.keys.DocumentKeyStoreOperationsImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DocumentKeyStoreOperations
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DocumentKeyStoreOperationsImplRuntimeDelegatable

    public class DocumentKeyStoreOperationsImpl
extends Object
implements DocumentKeyStoreOperations
    Provides different kinds of high-level keystore (that is for DOCUMENT storage) operations.

        public void updateReadKeyPassword(UserIDAuth forUser,
                                  ReadKeyPassword newPassword)
        Description copied from interface: DocumentKeyStoreOperations

        Specified by:
